definition: Longmen county in Huizhou 惠州[Hui4 zhou1], Guangdong/mythical Dragon gate where a carp can transform into a dragon

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
Longmen county in Huizhou 惠州[Hui4 zhou1], Guangdong
Mt Longmen, the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin, an active geological fault line/Mt Longmen in Shandong/Mt Longmen in Henan
Longmenshan fault line, a tectonically active thrust fault line at the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin
Longmenshan fault line, a tectonically active thrust fault line at the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin

sentences.english: The paper also discusses the structural evolution history of the forel…
sentences.chinese: 並討論了龍門山中段中生代前陸盆地的構造演化歷史。

sentences.english: Daniel, the Yi Gate Tower can be regarded as Longmen's landmark structure.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，這義門可以說是龍門鎮的標誌性建築了。

sentences.english: This is an essential link in the global controlling process.
sentences.chinese: 這是龍門吊作業全過程控制不可少的一環。

sentences.english: The story of vanquishing demons in Ludong is the only one in Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 路洞石窟降魔變是龍門石窟唯一的一鋪。

sentences.english: It was said that the writer of Journey to the West was Qiu Chuji the originator of Quanzhen denomination.
sentences.chinese: 古傳《西遊記》是全真教龍門派開創者丘處機所撰。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottoes are one of the three major treasure houses of stone carving in China.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟是中國三大石窟瑰寶之一。

sentences.english: But here in this ancient town, Longmen, I still have to rely one her.
sentences.chinese: 可是到了這龍門古鎮，我還是得依靠她。

sentences.english: The ball screw gantry provides precise positioning and high load carrying capacity.
sentences.chinese: 滾珠絲槓龍門提供精確定位和高承載能力。

sentences.english: Jinbang title once, like a carp to leap onto the goal.
sentences.chinese: 一朝題名金榜，猶如鯉魚躍上龍門。

sentences.english: Cliff inscriptions of sutra in Longmen Grottoes were, as many as 19, all finished during the early Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟的摩崖刻經達19部之多，全部爲初唐所刻。

sentences.english: This is called "jumping the dragon gate".
The two universities seem to be the dragon gate whose threshold was very terribly high.
sentences.chinese: 這兩所大學就彷彿變成了龍門，門檻高得可怕。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottos are situated on the bank of the Yi River in Luoyang, Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟座落在河南省洛陽伊水兩岸。

sentences.english: Fengxian Temple is the biggest cave in Longmen Grottoes, which is 30-meter in length and width.
sentences.chinese: 奉先寺是龍門石窟中最大的一個窟，長寬各30餘米。

sentences.english: In this paper, in the first place the mathematical model of the feed drive system of the NC planer type miller is built up.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先建立了數控龍門銑牀進給傳動鏈的數學模型。

sentences.english: After lunch, I managed a brief visit to the Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 喫過午餐後，我走馬觀花地參觀了龍門石窟。

definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]
